Control Name: 4.8.4 Redundant connections from different locations are used for cross-premises connectivity (ExpressRoute or VPN).
Control Statement: Are there redundant connections from different locations for cross-premises connectivity (ExpressRoute or VPN)? i.e. at least two connections from two different locations.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.8 What decisions have been taken to ensure networking and connectivity meets your reliability requirements?
control_attributes.Control: 4.8.4 Redundant connections from different locations are used for cross-premises connectivity (ExpressRoute or VPN).
control_attributes.Description: Are there redundant connections from different locations for cross-premises connectivity (ExpressRoute or VPN)? i.e. at least two connections from two different locations.
